PathLookupAttribute
Attribute
public
PathLookupAttribute

A custom attribute used to define fields that contain asset references to be resolved by path lookup.

Properties
AssetType
public Type AssetType { get; private set }

The type of asset to be resolved.

Functions
PathLookupAttribute
public PathLookupAttribute(
Type assetType
)

Initializes the PathLookup attribute with the provided asset type.
